greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array A(row,col) (listed in order A(0,0), A(0,1), A(1,0), A(0,2), A(1,1), A(2,0), A(0,3), etc.), giving essentially the same information as the triangle A074080 which shows only the upper triangular region.
xref: Obtained from the square array A073346 by dividing the entries on the k-th row by 2^k. Column sums: A073431. See A074080 for explanation. Cf. also A025581, A002262.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 19 2002
